extensionName.description: Name of the extension - please do not move.

extensionDescription.message: Captures EA requests (col1/collector) and their responses. Grind all of that and extract some knowledge about in real time.

tab-overview-label-traffickingtype.description: label for trafficking type in adcentric

tab-rawrequest-label-hostresponse.description: Host response label in the tab rawrequest

table-header-name.description: Table header #4 used in ad-centric history only

table-header-val.description: Table header #5 used in ad-centric history only

mode-notification.description: The type of mode used to display or not browser notifications when a tag is triggered

mode-silence.description: The type of mode used to display or not browser notifications when a tag is triggered

tb-toolbox.description: the name of the dropdown containing tools

tb-loaddatalayer.description: dropdown element used to load a datalayer

tb-removedatalayer.description: dropdown element used to remove a datalayer

tb-changedatalayer.description: dropdown element used to switch for a new datalayer

tb-exportall.message: Exportar todos los tag en formato .csv
tb-exportall.description: dropdown element used to download tags in csv

tb-removeall.description: dropdown element used to remove all requests

tb-qaready.description: the name of the dropdown when a datalayer is loaded

qa-name.description: name used in the modal for QA setup

qa-content-part-alreadyloaded.description: header of the tag content part

qa-placeholder-textarea.message:
Copiar aquí el datalayer del sitio à auditar
formato:csv
séparador:';'
tipos de tags autorizados:'genérico','producto','categoria','busqueda','venta','estimación'

msg-datalayerremoved.description: message display when datalayer is removed

msg-datalayeradded.description: message display when datalayer is added

msg-deleteall.message: Eliminar definitivamente todo el histórico de calls. Continuar ?
msg-deleteall.description: message display when user click on delete all

msg-nothingtodelete.description: message display when user click on delete all and there are no request captured

msg-invalddatalayer.message: El Datalayer no es valido. Carga Imposible
msg-invalddatalayer.description: message display when user want to load a datalayer invalid

msg-partialyvaliddatalayer.message: Atención, solamente los siguientes tags han podido ser cargados: $TAGTYPES$
msg-partialyvaliddatalayer.description: message display when user want to load a datalayer semi-valid

notification-sitecentrictagtriggered-tit.description: title of notification when the tag is correctly triggered

notification-sitecentrictagtriggered-mes.message:
Tag $TAGTYPE$ disparado en $FIRSTPARTY$ en $WSPAGE$ solamente $TIMEELAPSED$ s después de la llegada a la página.

Datos recuperados por el sitio $WSNAME$
notification-sitecentrictagtriggered-mes.description: content of notification when the tag is correctly triggered

notification-sitecentrictagtriggered-tit.description: title of notification when the tag is not correctly triggered

notification-sitecentrictagtriggered-mes.message: Ups, el tag $TAGTYPE$ disparado en $FIRSTPARTY$ en $WSPAGE$ no ha podido ser recuperado por nuestro sistema
notification-sitecentrictagtriggered-mes.description: content of notification when the tag is not correctly triggered

time-ago.description: This text is used in a tooltip displayed when hovering the request capture time

time-ago-less-than-one-hour.description: This text is used in a tooltip displayed when hovering the request capture time and capture time less than one hour
